name: MixToEarn
description: What is the project about? An innovative blockchain project that prioritizes user privacy and offers advanced transaction solutions. What makes your project unique? MixToEarn employs an advanced privacy mixer that utilizes zkSNARKs, a cryptographic protocol enabling privacy without compromising transaction verifiability. Users deposit their cryptocurrency into the privacy mixer, breaking the link between sender and receiver addresses using zkSNARKs and Merkle trees. This ensures transactional privacy through compact proofs of element inclusion. History of your project. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Certik audits, CEX Listings. What can your token be used for? Mixing protocol and earning rewards.
